text: LVMH Moët Hennessy – Louis Vuitton SE (), also known as LVMH, is a French multinational luxury goods conglomerate headquartered in Paris (France). The company was formed in 1987 under the merger of fashion house Louis Vuitton with Moët Hennessy, a company formed after the 1971. ==References== Category:French fashion houses Category:Companies based in Paris Category:1987 establishments in France Category:Conglomerate companies
title: LVMH
